physical_appearance: "The image shows a drawing. It is rectangular in shape.. The foreground shows a large building with several domes. All of the domes have spires attached above them. To the right of the drawing, there is a tall rectangular building and a couple of roofed buildings as well. The foreground of the drawing shows a crowd of people. Most of the people in the drawing have their backs towards the viewer, and are facing the buildings. The location, signature and year, ""Tan. 1958
creator_1: Tan, Choon Ghee, 1930- Tan, Choon Ghee
title_text: Venice, Piazza San Marco Venice, Plaza San Marco
subject_terms_2: Piazza San Marco"" is stated at the left hand side.  " Piazza San Marco (Venice, Italy) Basilica di San Marco (Venice, Italy) Buildings
